            前端摸🐟小子，教你减少无意义的编码
            <!----> <!----></h1> <div class="author-info-block block-hidden" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="author-info-box" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="author-name" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><a href="/user/97193028493655/posts" target="_blank" rel="" class="jj-link username username ellipsis" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><span class="name" style="max-width:160px;" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="">
    前端金熊
  </span> <!----> <!----> <!----> </a></div> <div class="meta-box" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><time datetime="2024-10-21T01:42:59.000Z" title="Mon Oct 21 2024 01:42:59 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)" class="time" data-v-7cdd11fb="">
                    2024-10-21
                  </time> <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="read-icon" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><path d="M7.90078 2.80078C4.49278 2.80078 1.74745 6.11672 0.800781 7.77469C1.74745 9.58339 4.49278 13.2008 7.90078 13.2008C11.3088 13.2008 14.0541 9.58339 15.0008 7.77469C14.0541 6.11672 11.3088 2.80078 7.90078 2.80078Z" stroke="currentColor" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></path><circle cx="7.89922" cy="8.00078" r="2.2" stroke="currentColor" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></circle></svg> <span class="views-count" data-v-7cdd11fb="">

                  </span> <span class="read-time" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><rect width="16" height="16" fill="none" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></rect><circle cx="8" cy="8" r="5.65625" stroke="#8A919F" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></circle><path d="M7.69141 5.18652V8.30924H10.8141" stroke="#8A919F" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></path></svg>
                    阅读1分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;在高效摸鱼的同时，我一直在思考：有没有办法用几个简单的单词缩写，就能快速输出想要的代码呢？</p>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;答案是肯定的！接下来，我将向大家介绍前端程序员必备的两大摸鱼小技巧：
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </p><p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/764e051305654e0881b5a9dd754d1aee~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=uKe3IbbdmoPpLRdVjU1qBs%2FFHHY%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p><p></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">一、 vscode自定义代码片段</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">位置</h3>
<ul>
<li>step1
<ul>
<li>按下 Ctrl+Shift+P(Mac 上是 Cmd+Shift+P)，输入 "snippets"</li>
<li>（或者）点击vscode左下角齿轮，找到代码片段</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/ee5572d358a84f20951be5765819754c~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=%2BJuxg1L9QViJrR4obK6zbexJ3Ug%3D" alt="image.png" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>step2
<ul>
<li>下面是我们选择编程语言。我一般选择全局代码片段文件，就可以在任意的文件中实现</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/6f0b8a5d14bb44cdba009d6fde21acd6~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=gvFLUqmTeqkblYlCT%2B44mJGzIy8%3D" alt="1729256855025.jpg" width="70%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">详细教程</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-3">1. 基本属性</h4>
<ul>
<li>prefix：触发对应代码片段的关键字</li>
<li>body：对应代码片段内容</li>
<li>description：代码片段的描述</li>
</ul>
<h5 data-id="heading-4">片段</h5>
<pre><code class="hljs language-json" lang="json"><span class="hljs-attr">"Print to console"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"logs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
                <span class="hljs-string">"console.log('$1', $1);"</span>
        <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"控制台打印变量"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
</code></pre>
<h5 data-id="heading-5">演示</h5>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e2709c537c984806b2324bdb20173c71~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=FkLW7G9RANnrRA%2FKzmp2m6D6z9Y%3D" alt="logs.gif" width="70%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-6">2. 占位符</h4>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $1,$2,$3...等是占位符，可以确定光标的位置，首先会出现在 $1 的位置,按 Tab 键后会跳到 $2.
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;注意：</p>
<ol>
<li>$0 永远是最后面，$1,$2...结束后tab会在$0。</li>
<li>${1:defalut}中可以设置默认值</li>
</ol>
<h5 data-id="heading-7">片段</h5>
<pre><code class="hljs language-json" lang="json"><span class="hljs-attr">"let"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"let"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
                <span class="hljs-string">"let ${2:key} = ${3:value};"</span>
        <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"let声明变量"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
</code></pre>
<h5 data-id="heading-8">演示</h5>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 按tab切换光标</p>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/054dc8bec8cc472eb76490a3cadb9c7b~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=x6QEFO08FKt4jv8OBEz52GJv8B4%3D" alt="let.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-9">3.常用内置变量</h4>
<ul>
<li>🌟<code>$CLIPBOARD</code>: 当前剪贴板中的内容</li>
<li><code>$TM_FILENAME</code>: 当前文件的文件名</li>
<li><code>$TM_FILENAME_BASE</code>: 当前文件的文件名(不含扩展名)</li>
<li><code>$TM_DIRECTORY</code>: 当前文件所在的目录</li>
<li><code>$TM_FILEPATH</code>: 当前文件的完整文件路径</li>
<li><code>$CURRENT_YEAR</code>：本年度</li>
<li><code>$CURRENT_HOUR</code>: 24小时制格式的当前时间</li>
</ul>
<h5 data-id="heading-10">片段</h5>
<pre><code class="hljs language-json" lang="json"><span class="hljs-attr">"paste to log"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"logg"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
                <span class="hljs-string">"console.log('$CLIPBOARD$1', $CLIPBOARD$1);"</span>
        <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"打印出剪切板内容"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
</code></pre>
<h5 data-id="heading-11">演示</h5>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;我提前复制了height，选择logg后会自动读取剪切板</p>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b534f954106f4ac99d51ad581bad57a5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=JBRZJ1%2FCFoOb%2BUUWUBZVb%2B%2Fe9jY%3D" alt="logg.gif" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-12">总结</h4>
<p>恭喜你又学会了一个摸鱼小技巧，快去应用到你的项目中去吧</p>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b61c4031e8e44bc688e616432910b5a4~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=xBAOc%2FytbLdr6fXW696Wyxha8dE%3D" alt="image.png" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-13">优秀代码片段例子</h3>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;下面是我自己写的一些非常好用的代码片段，大家可以直接复制到 VSCode 中使用。希望能帮到你们！大佬们也可以发挥自己的想象力，创造出更牛的片段，一起提升编码效率！🚀</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-json" lang="json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"Print to log"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"logs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"console.log('$1', $1);"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"控制台打印变量"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"Print to clone"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"JSONP"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"JSON.parse(JSON.stringify($1));"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"深拷贝对象"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"Print to clone log"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"logp"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"console.log('$1', JSON.parse(JSON.stringify($1)));"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"控制台打印出深拷贝对象"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"nextTick"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"next"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"this.$nextTick(() =&gt; {\n\t$1\n});"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"Vue中的this.$nextTick"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"import"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"import"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"import {$2} from '$1';"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"导入资源"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"let"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"let"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"let ${2:key} = ${3:value};"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"let声明变量"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"const"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"const"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"const ${2:key} = ${3:value};"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"const声明变量"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"Variable Declaration"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"vard"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"${1|const,let,var|} ${2:变量名} = ${3:值};"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"声明变量,可选择const/let/var"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"paste to log"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"logg"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"console.log('$CLIPBOARD$1', $CLIPBOARD$1);"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"打印出剪切板内容"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/37c590f84ef14008bf10b4b4a5cad6e5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=DSyJcB1m%2FhopVctXOK3NEoaAYwI%3D" alt="image.png" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-14">二、Emmet教程</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-15">前言</h3>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Emmet是VSCode默认支持的功能，无需任何配置，可直接使用</p>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;接下来将为你揭示如何利用 Emmet 在 VSCode 中优雅地编写前端代码，提高开发效率，节省宝贵生命。 和自定义代码片段会有一点点像，但 Emmet 的语法将为你带来不同的体验！</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-16">HTML标签嵌套：</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-17">1. 父子关系：&gt;</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div&gt;p&gt;span
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/7289b8908d284701a79d524f65bd3736~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=9I1fli07i4RvVqCutjs5EpddYU4%3D" alt="emmet》.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-18">2. 兄弟关系：+</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div+p+span 
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/61adf2861ff34f2080c10cc19b245b1c~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=F2kDsunP0zO2o6k58SLO%2FumrxKA%3D" alt="emmet+.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-19">3. 乘法：*</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	ul&gt;li*3
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e7097ecea4134179a97e37ba750c6a11~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=hlkogAbB3ltqAEPAqPpYrkDm3nE%3D" alt="emmet乘.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-20">4. 组合使用：()</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	table&gt;(tr&gt;(td*3))*2
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">table</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tr</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tr</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tr</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tr</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">table</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f282591a4e1e4fe1b18cfa1a0f70e829~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=pgSEwet1%2BqMKNmBDR4W9lCxHgZk%3D" alt="emmet组合.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-21">5. id,class,属性:</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	p#title
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"title"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>

//	.title
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"title"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span> // div可以不用写

//	td[rowspan=2 colspan=3 title]
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span> <span class="hljs-attr">rowspan</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"2"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">colspan</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"3"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">title</span>=<span class="hljs-string">""</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-22">6. 文本内容：{}</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div{我是div}
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>我是div<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/0472ddac039d48468d0a4119966b4193~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=nFnRn5ieZRSekYthkf91HXtlThE%3D" alt="emmet文本.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-23">7.自增符号：$</h4>
<ol>
<li>常搭配乘法*使用：<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mtext>（</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">		（</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">（</span></span></span></span></span>*4 =1 2 3 4自增）</li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	li.item$*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item1"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item2"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item3"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item4"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>

//	div{$}*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>1<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>2<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>3<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>4<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/0652730ca5564322a51410945e51acb1~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=9JcLFXwhMdpYPcG5qxyq2Ixswj0%3D" alt="emmet自增.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
2.  占位符 $$
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	（$$*4 = 01 02 03 04自增）
//	li.item$$$*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item001"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item002"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item003"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item004"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>

//	div{$$$$}*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0001<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0002<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0003<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0004<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/2abc82f524e2473e96ce4bea8821dee5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=eqBlKroHE8G9e2FdYzGvEc4Cnec%3D" alt="emmet占位.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
3.  指定开始数字：$@num*n		（num=开始数字，n=重复次数）
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div{$@6}*3
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>6<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>7<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>8<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/9d07327fc2ed4c30a18c6eb4db0072ae~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=Z9rD%2BnoJMWhrJ7poL3kzlJ8DBT8%3D" alt="emmet指定开始.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
4.  倒序：$@-
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div{$@-}*3
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>3<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>2<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>1<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
//	div{$@-6}*3
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>8<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>7<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>6<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/d5cf0e5069f7418c9011079ebb302eb5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=HJWfjp9yFxsd0nItPZHuzpXipvA%3D" alt="emmet倒序.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-24">css缩写</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css">&lt;!-- m10 --&gt;
<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
&lt;!-- m10p --&gt;
<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10%</span>;
&lt;!-- m10-<span class="hljs-number">20</span>-<span class="hljs-number">20</span>-<span class="hljs-number">20</span> --&gt;
<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
&lt;!-- ml10 --&gt;
<span class="hljs-attribute">margin-left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
// 以此类推......
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-25">了解更多</h3>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;以上是一些常用的 Emmet 语法，如果你对 Emmet 中其他部分语法感兴趣，可以查阅<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.emmet.io%2Fcheat-sheet%2F" target="_blank" title="https://docs.emmet.io/cheat-sheet/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Emmet的官方文档</a></p>
<p>各位摸鱼大佬们，还有其他私藏的减少重复编码小技巧吗？欢迎在评论区分享你的经验！一起提升开发效率，享受更多的“摸鱼”时光！🐟✨</p>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/3ea082bbd9a1455c9c25411786a8bf40~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=rqsw8XcrcI%2FKB3n7DW7j1xcXem0%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p></div></div>
